function EP_BAD_02()

  -- なぜなのボク姫
  SaveData.Title = "なぜなのボク姫"

SAVE()

  -- //EP2［転-7］の時点で[ビジュアル]が２レベル以下の場合、オウガルートへ移行後に発生。

LAYER_CLEAR_ALL()

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)

-- //SE：開始音（ﾃﾚﾃﾃﾚﾃﾃｰ!!）
PLAY_SE("SEz006.wav")
-- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（開始）

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Three!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano02.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Two!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano03.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "One!" ]])

  PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",0,true)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028aa")
  LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,500,500)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,100,100,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  EFFECT_SCREEN(1,30,30,500,false,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano04.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Boom!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano05.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Wheeeeee!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ba")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask023",1000,false)

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫背景
  -- //BU：ミナト（笑顔）、アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）
  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  --LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
  --PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",1000,true)

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano06.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato・Akira】
 "Why, Bokuhime~!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano07.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】笑顔
 "Everyone, please gather around!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano08.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】笑顔
 "Don’t worry even if you get a bad ending! It’s time for ‘Why Bokuhime’, where I’ll explain why you got this ending!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano09.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・通常
 "Gather round..." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano32.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】焦り
 "Y-you’re low energy again!? What’s wrong!? This time you were a star in the main story!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04da")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano33.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・悲しみ
 "Of course. I told you many times, ‘raise your Visual first’, but you wouldn’t listen." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano34.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・真剣
 "I’ll say it straight. The cause of this bad ending is ‘not listening to me’, that’s all." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano35.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】悲しみ
 "Th-that can’t be helped... Isn’t it scary to just raise the same ability over and over?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01fa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano36.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】苦笑・汗
 "I understand the feeling of wanting to raise stats evenly." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04sa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano37.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】もこう
 "Smooch<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> So… this is why Minachin can’t win." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

  LAYER_EFFECT(50,6,25,25,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano38.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】焦り
 "Akira!? What’s with you all of a sudden!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano39.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】もこう
 "If you just ignore it, no one can call that training. If you’re a cross-dressing boy, you have to take proper notes, right in front of the screen, you... on what I’m saying." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano40.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】もこう
 "Listen up! A Himegal’s [Visual] is strong! Yes, write this down!" ]])

  LAYER_EFFECT(50,6,25,0,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano41.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】焦り
 "W-w-w-wait, got it, got it, stop making that face! It’s scary!!!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ca")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

  LAYER_EFFECT(55,6,20,20,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano42.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・驚き
 "Ah...!? I-I'm sorry... out of frustration, I accidentally possessed and merged with the spirit of a famous teacher. <r=ひょういがったい>" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano43.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・通常
 "Anyway, the opponent is a super popular reader model. Minachin can’t win without improving her appearance." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano44.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・真剣
 "Training starts with [Visual]! Once you’ve taken notes, quickly redo your training." ]])

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（おわり）
  STOP_BGM(1000)
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano45.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "If you don’t watch closely next time, I’ll come to your house and beat you up." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano46.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Eek! I said stop making that face!" ]])

  -- //第２章冒頭に戻る

  -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

-- トレーニングパラメーターのEP2時点の値に戻す
-- ヴィジュアル
SaveData.TrainingParam.Visual = SaveData.EP02_TrainingParam.Visual
-- 教養
SaveData.TrainingParam.Intelligence = SaveData.EP02_TrainingParam.Intelligence
-- 精神
SaveData.TrainingParam.Mental = SaveData.EP02_TrainingParam.Mental

SystemSaveData.IsClearEP_BAD_02 = true;
ScenarioManager.Next(SaveData.BadNextScenario)
SaveData.BadNextScenario = ""

end
